item.itunes:author: Maredi Thema | Solid Gold Podcasts
item.title: Celebrating Fatherhood as fathers | Maredi Thema (Maredi Technologies | CEO and MTLI | Founder ) Sibusiso Msomi (Managing Director) SJ Thema (Lawyer) Alex Odiekila (Musician/MC)
item.itunes:title: Celebrating Fatherhood as fathers | Maredi Thema (Maredi Technologies | CEO and MTLI | Founder ) Sibusiso Msomi (Managing Director) SJ Thema (Lawyer) Alex Odiekila (Musician/MC)
item.itunes:subtitle: Conversations with fathers about fatherhood and the fathers day webinar
item.description:
Celebrating Fatherhood as fathers — Conversations with fathers about fatherhood and the fathers day webinar Maredi Thema (Maredi Technologies | CEO and MTLI | Founder ) Sibusiso Msomi (Managing Director) SJ Thema (Lawyer) Alex Odiekila (Musician/MC) This episode explores the role of fatherhood, what it means, the importance of having a father, Etc. Maredi also tells us about the success of the #AllAboutDads2020 webinar on Father's Day, themed #TakeYourThrone The concept of #TakeYourThrone is broken down and explained what it means for each father. And each father tells us their experiences or perspective on the importance of having a father in one's life because each experience informs the kind of man you become and ultimately the kind of father you are to your kids.


Visit our website https://maredithema.co.za/


When you're ready to #BeHeard, contact the podcast specialists at SolidGold.co.za

Maredi also tells us about the success of the #AllAboutDads2020 webinar on Father's Day, themed #TakeYourThrone The concept of #TakeYourThrone is broken down and explained what it means for each father. item.author: maredi-thema@solidgold.co.za (Maredi Thema | Solid Gold Podcasts)
item.itunes:author: Maredi Thema | Solid Gold Podcasts
item.title: What does being a good father mean? | Kopano Monyetsane (AWS | Global trade and Compliance Manager)
item.itunes:title: What does being a good father mean? | Kopano Monyetsane (AWS | Global trade and Compliance Manager)
item.itunes:subtitle: How do I show up as a father?
item.description:
What does being a good father mean? — How do I show up as a father? Kopano Monyetsane (AWS | Global trade and Compliance Manager) Key themes What does being a good father mean? -Defining your throne - what does that mean practically? - Best way to support your boy or girl child - What is the difference between raising the different genders? - When do you say I have done well, what are the key indicators or measures I can use to celebrate myself? - Where did I learn to be a father? - Are we raising them to be like us? Or raising them to be their own people? How do I show up as a father? - Scrutinizing and examining how you are measuring up as a dad - Challenge with time : quality time and sharing deliberate moments with your child Vs duration of time spent with your kids - The complexity and struggle of juggling being a provider, a nurturer and finding yourself - Dealing with the father's guilt Taking your throne - What does this mean? - Fatherhood - a process of doing well Vs destination of doing well - is it the journey or the destination that defines you? - Clarifying what the process looks like - Are we too hard on ourselves?


Visit our website https://maredithema.co.za/


When you're ready to #BeHeard, contact the podcast specialists at SolidGold.co.za

item.itunes:author: Maredi Thema | Solid Gold Podcasts
item.title: Take Your Throne - conversations with dads about fatherhood | Maredi Thema (MTLI, MT | Founder and CEO) Siza Lugojolo (Pastor) and SJ Thema (Lawyer)
item.itunes:title: Take Your Throne - conversations with dads about fatherhood | Maredi Thema (MTLI, MT | Founder and CEO) Siza Lugojolo (Pastor) and SJ Thema (Lawyer)
item.itunes:subtitle: The episode focuses on fatherhood, unpacking the highlights and challenges
item.description:
Take Your Throne - conversations with dads about fatherhood — The episode focuses on fatherhood, unpacking the highlights and challenges Maredi Thema (MTLI, MT | Founder and CEO) Siza Lugojolo (Pastor) and SJ Thema (Lawyer) This episode unpacks the impact of fatherhood on children's lives, particularly the impact or effect of a father's love on child development. This is a conversation with fathers where the father's perspective on parenting is in the foreground.


Visit our website https://maredithema.co.za/


When you're ready to #BeHeard, contact the podcast specialists at SolidGold.co.za
